verses.text: \w Now|strong="H3588"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H7121"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w spoken|strong="H1696"\w* \w unto|strong="H1696"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w woman|strong="H1004"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w had|strong="H3068"\w* \w restored|strong="H2421"\w* \w to|strong="H1696"\w* \w life|strong="H2421"\w*, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*, \w Arise|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w* \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w* wheresoever \w thou|strong="H3588"\w* canst \w sojourn|strong="H1481"\w*: \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w called|strong="H7121"\w* \w for|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w famine|strong="H7458"\w*; \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H7121"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w also|strong="H1571"\w* \w come|strong="H3212"\w* \w upon|strong="H7121"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* land \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6965"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w woman|strong="H1004"\w* \w arose|strong="H6965"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w did|strong="H6213"\w* according \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w* \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* man \w of|strong="H1004"\w* God; \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w she|strong="H1931"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w with|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H1931"\w* \w household|strong="H1004"\w*, \w and|strong="H6965"\w* \w sojourned|strong="H1481"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* land \w of|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H6213"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w it|strong="H7725"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w at|strong="H1004"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w seven|strong="H7651"\w* \w years|strong="H8141"\w*’ \w end|strong="H7097"\w*, \w that|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w woman|strong="H1004"\w* \w returned|strong="H7725"\w* \w out|strong="H3318"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w Philistines|strong="H6430"\w*: \w and|strong="H7725"\w* she \w went|strong="H3318"\w* \w forth|strong="H3318"\w* \w to|strong="H7725"\w* \w cry|strong="H6817"\w* \w unto|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H7725"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H3318"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w for|strong="H1004"\w* \w her|strong="H3318"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w*.

\w Now|strong="H4994"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w talking|strong="H1696"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w man|strong="H5288"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* God, \w saying|strong="H1696"\w*, \w Tell|strong="H1696"\w* \w me|strong="H4994"\w*, \w I|strong="H5288"\w* \w pray|strong="H4994"\w* \w thee|strong="H6213"\w*, \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w things|strong="H1419"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* Elisha \w hath|strong="H4428"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w it|strong="H1931"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w*, \w as|strong="H1961"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w telling|strong="H5608"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w how|strong="H2009"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w restored|strong="H2421"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w life|strong="H2421"\w* \w him|strong="H5921"\w* \w that|strong="H1931"\w* \w was|strong="H1961"\w* \w dead|strong="H4191"\w*, \w that|strong="H1931"\w*, \w behold|strong="H2009"\w*, \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w woman|strong="H2088"\w*, \w whose|strong="H1121"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H1931"\w* \w had|strong="H1961"\w* \w restored|strong="H2421"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w life|strong="H2421"\w*, \w cried|strong="H6817"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w house|strong="H1004"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w for|strong="H5921"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w*. \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Gehazi|strong="H1522"\w* said, \w My|strong="H5921"\w* lord, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w*, \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w woman|strong="H2088"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w is|strong="H2088"\w* \w her|strong="H5921"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w*, whom \w Elisha|strong="H2421"\w* \w restored|strong="H2421"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w life|strong="H2421"\w*.

\w And|strong="H7725"\w* \w when|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w asked|strong="H7592"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* woman, \w she|strong="H5704"\w* \w told|strong="H5608"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w*. \w So|strong="H5414"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w appointed|strong="H5414"\w* \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w her|strong="H3605"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* certain \w officer|strong="H5631"\w*, saying, \w Restore|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w was|strong="H3117"\w* hers, \w and|strong="H7725"\w* \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w fruits|strong="H8393"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w field|strong="H7704"\w* \w since|strong="H3117"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w day|strong="H3117"\w* \w that|strong="H3605"\w* \w she|strong="H5704"\w* \w left|strong="H5800"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* \w land|strong="H7704"\w*, \w even|strong="H5704"\w* \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w now|strong="H6258"\w*.

\w And|strong="H4428"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H5704"\w* \w came|strong="H4428"\w* \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*; \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w the|strong="H5704"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* Syria \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w sick|strong="H2470"\w*; \w and|strong="H4428"\w* \w it|strong="H5704"\w* \w was|strong="H4428"\w* \w told|strong="H5046"\w* \w him|strong="H5046"\w*, saying, \w The|strong="H5704"\w* man \w of|strong="H4428"\w* God \w is|strong="H4428"\w* come \w hither|strong="H2008"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* said \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w*, \w Take|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w present|strong="H4503"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w hand|strong="H3027"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H3212"\w*, \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w the|strong="H3947"\w* \w man|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w God|strong="H3068"\w*, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w inquire|strong="H1875"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w by|strong="H3027"\w* \w him|strong="H3027"\w*, saying, \w Shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w recover|strong="H2421"\w* \w of|strong="H4428"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w sickness|strong="H2483"\w*?

\w So|strong="H3947"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w went|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w meet|strong="H7125"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w present|strong="H4503"\w* \w with|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, even \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w every|strong="H3605"\w* \w good|strong="H2898"\w* \w thing|strong="H2088"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Damascus|strong="H1834"\w*, forty \w camels|strong="H1581"\w*’ \w burden|strong="H4853"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w came|strong="H3212"\w* \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w stood|strong="H5975"\w* \w before|strong="H6440"\w* \w him|strong="H6440"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* said, \w Thy|strong="H3947"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w Ben-hadad|strong="H1130"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Syria \w hath|strong="H4428"\w* \w sent|strong="H7971"\w* \w me|strong="H6440"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w thee|strong="H6440"\w*, saying, \w Shall|strong="H1121"\w* \w I|strong="H2088"\w* \w recover|strong="H2421"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w sickness|strong="H2483"\w*?

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H2421"\w* said \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w Go|strong="H3212"\w*, say \w unto|strong="H3068"\w* \w him|strong="H7200"\w*, \w Thou|strong="H3588"\w* shalt \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w recover|strong="H2421"\w*; howbeit \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w shall|strong="H3068"\w* \w surely|strong="H4191"\w* \w die|strong="H4191"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w settled|strong="H5975"\w* \w his|strong="H7760"\w* \w countenance|strong="H6440"\w* \w stedfastly|strong="H7760"\w* \add upon him\add*, \w until|strong="H5704"\w* \w he|strong="H5704"\w* \w was|strong="H6440"\w* ashamed: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w man|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* God \w wept|strong="H1058"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* said, \w Why|strong="H4069"\w* \w weepeth|strong="H1058"\w* \w my|strong="H3045"\w* lord? \w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* answered, \w Because|strong="H3588"\w* \w I|strong="H3588"\w* \w know|strong="H3045"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w evil|strong="H7451"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* wilt \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w unto|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*: \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w strongholds|strong="H4013"\w* wilt \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* \w set|strong="H7971"\w* \w on|strong="H7971"\w* fire, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w young|strong="H1121"\w* \w men|strong="H1121"\w* wilt \w thou|strong="H3045"\w* \w slay|strong="H2026"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w the|strong="H3588"\w* \w sword|strong="H2719"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* wilt \w dash|strong="H7376"\w* \w in|strong="H3478"\w* \w pieces|strong="H7376"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w little|strong="H5768"\w* \w ones|strong="H5768"\w*, \w and|strong="H1121"\w* \w rip|strong="H1234"\w* \w up|strong="H1234"\w* \w their|strong="H3588"\w* \w women|strong="H2030"\w* \w with|strong="H6213"\w* \w child|strong="H2030"\w*.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w*, \w But|strong="H3588"\w* \w what|strong="H4100"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w thy|strong="H3068"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*, \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w but|strong="H3588"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w dog|strong="H3611"\w*, \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w he|strong="H3588"\w* \w should|strong="H3068"\w* \w do|strong="H6213"\w* \w this|strong="H2088"\w* \w great|strong="H1419"\w* \w thing|strong="H1697"\w*? \w And|strong="H3068"\w* Elisha \w answered|strong="H1697"\w*, \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w hath|strong="H3068"\w* \w showed|strong="H7200"\w* \w me|strong="H7200"\w* \w that|strong="H3588"\w* \w thou|strong="H6213"\w* shalt \w be|strong="H1697"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* Syria.

\w Then|strong="H4100"\w* \w he|strong="H3212"\w* \w departed|strong="H3212"\w* \w from|strong="H3212"\w* \w Elisha|strong="H2421"\w*, \w and|strong="H3212"\w* \w came|strong="H3212"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w his|strong="H2421"\w* master; \w who|strong="H4100"\w* said \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w him|strong="H2421"\w*, \w What|strong="H4100"\w* said \w Elisha|strong="H2421"\w* \w to|strong="H3212"\w* \w thee|strong="H3212"\w*? \w And|strong="H3212"\w* \w he|strong="H3212"\w* answered, \w He|strong="H3212"\w* told \w me|strong="H2421"\w* \w that|strong="H3212"\w* \w thou|strong="H3212"\w* wouldest \w surely|strong="H2421"\w* \w recover|strong="H2421"\w*.

\w And|strong="H6440"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w came|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H4191"\w* \w pass|strong="H1961"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w morrow|strong="H4283"\w*, \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w took|strong="H3947"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* coverlet, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w dipped|strong="H2881"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w water|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w spread|strong="H6566"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w* \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w*, \w so|strong="H3947"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w he|strong="H5921"\w* \w died|strong="H4191"\w*: \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w Hazael|strong="H2371"\w* \w reigned|strong="H4427"\w* \w in|strong="H5921"\w* \w his|strong="H3947"\w* \w stead|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w And|strong="H1121"\w* \w in|strong="H8141"\w* \w the|strong="H3092"\w* \w fifth|strong="H2568"\w* \w year|strong="H8141"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Joram|strong="H3141"\w* \w the|strong="H3092"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* Ahab \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w*, \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w being|strong="H4427"\w* \w then|strong="H4428"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w Jehoram|strong="H3088"\w* \w the|strong="H3092"\w* \w son|strong="H1121"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Jehoshaphat|strong="H3092"\w* \w king|strong="H4428"\w* \w of|strong="H1121"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w* \w began|strong="H3063"\w* \w to|strong="H3478"\w* \w reign|strong="H4427"\w*.

Howbeit \w Jehovah|strong="H3068"\w* \w would|strong="H3068"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w destroy|strong="H7843"\w* \w Judah|strong="H3063"\w*, \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w David|strong="H1732"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w servant|strong="H5650"\w*’s \w sake|strong="H4616"\w*, \w as|strong="H3117"\w* \w he|strong="H3117"\w* \w promised|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w to|strong="H3068"\w* \w give|strong="H5414"\w* \w unto|strong="H5414"\w* \w him|strong="H5414"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* \w lamp|strong="H5216"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w his|strong="H3605"\w* \w children|strong="H1121"\w* \w alway|strong="H3117"\w*.
